The capital city is also named Kirundo. Kirundo has three big lakes: Cohoha, Rweru, and Rwihinda. ==Communes== It is divided administratively into the following communes: * Commune of Bugabira * Commune of Busoni * Commune of Bwambarangwe * Commune of Gitobe * Commune of Kirundo * Commune of Ntega * Commune of Vumbi Category:Provinces of Burundi
title: Kirundo Province
